channel.title: Comments on: [Ghost of Tsushima] I had no idea what to do at the shrine and then suddenly it work. Hands down the coolest outfit in the game.

item.title: By: AbouTimeJamie
item.dc:creator: AbouTimeJamie
item.description: It's the ghost of bloody Sparta.

item.title: By: monkey484
item.dc:creator: monkey484
item.description: I won't spoil anything but the first one I stumbled upon I had no idea what to do. I read the poem a bunch of times, jumped around, shot things to no avail. I admit I had to look it up. It's a very cool idea.
item.content:encoded: I won’t spoil anything but the first one I stumbled upon I had no idea what to do. I read the poem a bunch of times, jumped around, shot things to no avail. I admit I had to look it up. It’s a very cool idea.

item.title: By: LT_Snaker
item.dc:creator: LT_Snaker
item.description: There are a few more. Not gonna spoil it but look for more shrines.
item.content:encoded: There are a few more. Not gonna spoil it but look for more shrines.

item.title: By: UniversityOk7336
item.dc:creator: UniversityOk7336
item.description: Wait can you guys tell how I can get this??
item.content:encoded: Wait can you guys tell how I can get this??

item.title: By: DarthDragonborn
item.dc:creator: DarthDragonborn
item.description: He’s gonna be like Patrick trying to go through doors.
item.content:encoded: He’s gonna be like Patrick trying to go through doors.

item.title: By: Bassiette

item.description: How can i unlock God of war skin ?
item.content:encoded: How can i unlock God of war skin ?

item.title: By: Niijima-San
item.dc:creator: Niijima-San
item.description: at the rate i am going i will prolly have this armor at like the 70 plus hour mark since i am trying to 100% the game (i know you don't have to for the plat cuz i accidentally loaded my PS4 save LOL)
item.content:encoded: at the rate i am going i will prolly have this armor at like the 70 plus hour mark since i am trying to 100% the game (i know you don’t have to for the plat cuz i accidentally loaded my PS4 save LOL)

item.title: By: Kordben

item.description: He will bring the destruction of Tsushima!
item.content:encoded: He will bring the destruction of Tsushima!
